name: Taigi Custom Font for Websites - OpenHuninn2.0
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Taigi custom font for Websites. Download and install the font here: https://justfont.com/huninn/ Kái chò Tâi-bûn jī-kut, hō͘ 1-kóa bāng-chām hián-sī iōng--ê. Chhiáⁿ seng kā jī-kut lia̍h--lo̍h-lâi, an-chng hó-sè: https://justfont.com/huninn/
